display_help: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown
display_target_help: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
display_target_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
